column2: Award Criteria
Awarded when Nook Miles program is first unlocked
Number of total fish caught
Number of unique fish caught
Number of days in which you've talked to every one of your villagers
Number of total bugs caught
Number of unique bugs caught
Number of DIY recipes collected
Number of tools you've crafted
Number of furniture pieces you've crafted
Number of times you've customized furniture at a workbench
Number of times you've chopped wood from trees
Number of tools you've broken
Awarded the first time you get 8 ores/stones from striking a rock
Awarded the first time you dig up a fossil
Number of fossils you've had assessed by Blathers
Number of weed clumps you've sold to the shop
Number of flower seeds you've planted (does not count digging up and replanting existing flowers)
Number of flowers you've watered
Number of tree saplings you've planted (does not count planting fruits or replanting existing trees)
Number of fruits you've sold to the shop
Awarded for each unique fruit tree you've planted (cherry, orange, pear, peach, apple, and coconut)
Number of seashells you've sold to the shop
Number of clams you've dug up
Number of trash items (cans, tires, or boots) you've fished up
Number of fish you've caught in a single streak without any getting away
Number of times you've expanded your home
Awarded the first time you get an "S" ranking from the HHA
Number of furniture pieces you've placed in your house
Number of items you've placed in your home storage
Number of times you've remodeled the outside appearance of your home
Number of villager requests you've fulfilled (such as returning lost items)
Number of reactions you've learned
Awarded the first time you take a photo using the camera app on the NookPhone (screenshot button does not count, must use the app)
Awarded the first time you edit your Passport (title, comment, or photo)
Awarded after the 10th time you open your NookPhone
Awarded after the 1000th time you open your NookPhone
Number of times you've ordered from the Nook Shopping catalog
Number of unique furniture pieces you've added to your catalog
Number of Nook Miles+ goals you've completed
Awarded the first time you purchase an item from a shop
Awarded the first time you sell and item to a shop
Awarded when you pay off your initial loan using Nook Miles
Number of total bells you've spent in shops
Awarded the first time you purchase turnips
Number of total bells you've profited from selling turnips
Awarded after paying off your first house loan with bells
Awarded the first time you post a message on your town bulletin board
Number of letters you've sent
Number of times you've caught fleas off a villager
Awarded the first time you catch a cicada shell
Awarded the first time you catch five wasps in a row without running away or getting stung
Awarded the first time you bury a pitfall seed
Awarded the first time you get stung by a wasp
Awarded the first time you get knocked out by a Scorpion or Tarantula
Awarded the first time you fall into a pitfall hole
Awarded the first time a balloon present you shot lands in a body of water
Number of balloons you've shot down with a slingshot
Awarded the first time you place a fence
Number of perfect snow-people you've built
Number of shooting stars you've wished on.
Awarded the first time you place some furniture outside
Awarded for changing your town tune and island flag for the first time
Awarded the first time you use the Island Designer app to place a path, add/remove water, and build/destroy a cliff
Number of times you've helped Wisp find the parts of his spirit
Number of times you've helped Gulliver fix his communicator
Number of K.K. shows you've attended
Number of villagers you've become good friends with
Number of villager birthdays you've attended
Awarded the first time you play on your character's birthday
Awarded the first time you attend a fishing tourney in each season
Awarded the first time you attend a bug-off tourney in each season
Awarded for attending the new year holiday event
Awarded the first time you use a wardrobe to change your character's outfit
Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design app to edit or create a design
Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design pro app to edit or create a design
Awarded the first time you dig up bells from a shining spot
Number of furniture pieces you've found from shaking trees
Awarded for each unique golden tool you've equipped (shovel, net, fishing rod, watering can, axe, and slingshot)
Number of times you've visited another player's island (does not count mystery islands using Nook Miles Tickets)
Number of other players that have visited your island
Number of total unique days you've played the game
